amendment.description: Amendment guarantees the VA an additional $579 million in the event that the third party collection program does not collect expected funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in House Rept. 105-180, to guarantee that the VA Medical Collections Fund will be funded at $579 million, even if third-party receipts did not fully fund the account. If needed, funds would be offset by reducing outlays for EPA Science and Technology.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
